title: TVLine Items: My Life With the Walter Boys Adds 5, Carrie Underwood Concert Special and More

author: Vlada Gelman
categories: My Life With the Walter Boys
excerpt: 'My Life With the Walter Boys' Season 2 cast adds five new recurring characters -- get details!
text: TVLine Items: My Life With the Walter Boys Adds 5, Carrie Underwood Concert Special and MoreFive new characters will be hanging out with the Walter Boys on Netflix. My Life With the Walter Boys Season 2 has added the following actors in recurring roles: Natalie Sharp (The Flash) as B. Hartford, a champion rodeo rider who catches the eye of one of the Walter boys; Carson MacCormac (Locke & Key) as Zach, a commanding and a bit dangerous senior who attempts to get to know Nathan; Janet Kidder (Star Trek: Discovery) as Joanne Wagner, Grace’s mom; Riele Downs (Bel-Air) as Maria, a flirty girl in Alex’s Driver’s Ed class; and Jake Manley (The Order) as Wylder Holt, a competitive force in bronc riding who crosses paths with Alex. A release date has not been announced yet for Season 2, which recently finished filming. Ready for some more recent newsy nuggets? Well… * Carrie Underwood: Reflection, a concert special from the singer’s Las Vegas residency, will debut in January on Hulu. * NBC’s annual Christmas in Rockefeller Center special, airing Wednesday, Dec. 4 at 8/7c, will feature performances by Backstreet Boys, Dan + Shay, Megan Hilty, Jennifer Hudson, Coco Jones, Little Big Town, RAYE, the Radio City Rockettes, and Thalia. * Starstruck star Rose Matafeo’s next stand-up comedy special, Rose Matafeo: On and On and On, will release Thursday, Dec. 19 on Max. * Netflix has released a teaser trailer for Apple Cider Vinegar, an upcoming series starring Kaitlyn Dever (Dopesick) as a wellness influencer who lies about having brain cancer: Which of today’s TVLine Items pique your interest?
html:
TVLine Items: My Life With the Walter Boys Adds 5, Carrie Underwood Concert Special and More

Five new characters will be hanging out with the Walter Boys on Netflix.

My Life With the Walter Boys Season 2 has added the following actors in recurring roles: Natalie Sharp (The Flash) as B. Hartford, a champion rodeo rider who catches the eye of one of the Walter boys; Carson MacCormac (Locke & Key) as Zach, a commanding and a bit dangerous senior who attempts to get to know Nathan; Janet Kidder (Star Trek: Discovery) as Joanne Wagner, Grace’s mom; Riele Downs (Bel-Air) as Maria, a flirty girl in Alex’s Driver’s Ed class; and Jake Manley (The Order) as Wylder Holt, a competitive force in bronc riding who crosses paths with Alex.

A release date has not been announced yet for Season 2, which recently finished filming.

Ready for some more recent newsy nuggets? Well…

* Carrie Underwood: Reflection, a concert special from the singer’s Las Vegas residency, will debut in January on Hulu.

* NBC’s annual Christmas in Rockefeller Center special, airing Wednesday, Dec. 4 at 8/7c, will feature performances by Backstreet Boys, Dan + Shay, Megan Hilty, Jennifer Hudson, Coco Jones, Little Big Town, RAYE, the Radio City Rockettes, and Thalia.

* Starstruck star Rose Matafeo’s next stand-up comedy special, Rose Matafeo: On and On and On, will release Thursday, Dec. 19 on Max.

* Netflix has released a teaser trailer for Apple Cider Vinegar, an upcoming series starring Kaitlyn Dever (Dopesick) as a wellness influencer who lies about having brain cancer:

Which of today’s TVLine Items pique your interest?
